title: Development of Instructional Design and Interaction Strategies to Enhance Online Language Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative activities and formative assessment-centered feedback systems using learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can analyze essential language competencies by specialized field and apply them to online course design.
Learners can develop three or more interactive strategies that promote advanced cognitive processes (critical thinking, problem-solving) in language domains.
Learners can design educational scenarios utilizing team-based communication and leadership skills in real-time online environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
